meanings.definition: To cheer or shout in celebration or approval.
meanings.sent1: The crowd was hoorahing for their team at the game.
meanings.sent2: Everyone started hoorahing when the winner was announced.
meanings.sent3: The children were hoorahing with joy as they opened their presents.
meanings.sent4: The streets were hoorahing with excitement during the parade.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't help hoorahing when she saw her favorite band perform live.

meanings.definition: The act of expressing excitement or enthusiasm loudly.
meanings.sent1: The hoorahing of the fans filled the stadium.
meanings.sent2: His loud hoorahing could be heard from across the room.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected hoorahing startled the quiet library patrons.
meanings.sent4: The hoorahing of the children echoed through the playground.
meanings.sent5: The hoorahing of the crowd made the event even more thrilling.

meanings.definition: Participating in a loud, enthusiastic celebration.
meanings.sent1: The hoorahing crowd danced and cheered together.
meanings.sent2: The hoorahing group of friends celebrated late into the night.
meanings.sent3: The hoorahing party was the talk of the town for weeks.
meanings.sent4: The hoorahing atmosphere filled the room with energy.
meanings.sent5: The hoorahing fans painted their faces in team colors for the game.
